body:
So I rewrote my re-prompt script to join against main summary pings (using HBase) to have a better idea of whether the repeat users that we're seeing are on the system addon or built in version.

Unfortunately, while the system addon seems better, repeats still exist.

| Repeats Present? | % Users in group with built in | % Users in group with sys addon | % Users where packet parsing fails | Total |
| ------ | ------ | ------ | ------ | ------ |
| False | 50% | 42% | 8% | 100% |
| True | 71% | 20% | 9% | 100% |

Data is for recipe Tel-Exp-2 after May 12.  Ping me for the Spark gist.  It's a bit hard to parse, but I feel pretty good about the logic.  Happy to do a code review or peer.

body_html:
So I rewrote my re-prompt script to join against main summary pings (using HBase) to have a better idea of whether the repeat users that we're seeing are on the system addon or built in version.

Unfortunately, while the system addon seems better, repeats still exist.

Repeats Present? % Users in group with built in % Users in group with sys addon % Users where packet parsing fails Total
False 50% 42% 8% 100%
True 71% 20% 9% 100%

Data is for recipe Tel-Exp-2 after May 12. Ping me for the Spark gist. It's a bit hard to parse, but I feel pretty good about the logic. Happy to do a code review or peer.
